name: 101 Penguin Pets 3D
description:
There's nothing better than a pet
penguin! With 101 Penguin Pets 3D,
you can have your very own penguin
friend to pamper, play with and love,
all in amazing 3D. Teach your penguin
to breakdance, dress it up in hilarious
clothes, and enjoy fun minigames as
you take your penguin to the vet, give
it a bath, go skiing and more. You'll
never be bored with over 101 penguin
friends to groom, pamper, play with
and love!
